A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The Pros:nice special effects (so +1 star)
Cons: irrelevant story\, irrelevant and boring characters (some who attract the audiences attention just disappear\, some are cheaply pushed into the plot) \, embarrassingly unfunny slap stick comedy moments\, full of logic flaws\, forced creatures who are obviously only introduced because you can sell some plush figures\, 

personally\, i think a huge amount of stakeholders (feminists\, vegetarians\, merchandising department\, anti capitalists) tried to force the writers to include their stuff\, and resulted in a movie plot\, that consists of fragments\, that seem to be completely out of place\, embedded in the star wars universe.
obviously\, the makers were only interested in generating maximum profit by packing all this stuff into the movie\, to look appealing for an audience as big as possible\, instead of trying to create memorable a star wars masterpiece

all in all\, huge marketing\, fantastic special effects\, but a very dull movie.

what a waste of potential
